message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $1350000 for the product.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a fair price considering the product's value to me.

Thank you for your interest, Bob. I appreciate your feedback. Based on our discussion, I am willing to consider a price of $1275000 for the product. This reflects a middle ground between our initial offers.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1225000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand your position, Bob. Considering our previous discussions, I am prepared to offer the product at $1250000. This price reflects a compromise that respects both our interests.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your continued willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1225000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After careful consideration, I am willing to offer the product at $1237500. This price aims to meet your expectations while still ensuring a reasonable profit for us.

Thank you for the revised offer, Alice. I appreciate your continued negotiation. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1220000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand your position, Bob. After further deliberation, I am prepared to offer the product at $1230000. This price seeks to balance your needs with our desired profit margin.

Thank you for your continued negotiation, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to work with me. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me and the market conditions.
